Header: The whole nation will swear Bak Maha Divuruma tomorrow
Content: Marking the initiative to uproot drug menace, the whole nation will take the Bak Maha Divuruma tomorrow to commit themselves to control and eliminate the illegal drugs. Bak Maha Divuruma main function will be held at the Independence Square in Colombo under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena at 8.15 a.m. tomorrow. Representatives of all religions, members of the government and opposition members of the Parliament, governors of the provinces, chief ministers and representatives will join this oath taking against drugs.This event will be live streamed through electronic media, and will be simultaneously telecast to institutions, public servants, school children and the general public.
